DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ONO-1101 in patients scheduled for multi-slice CT, in a double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled, parallel group, multi-center study.
DOC.brief_title: Study of ONO-1101 in Patients Scheduled for Multi-Slice Computed Tomography (CT)
DOC.criteria: ≥ 20 years old Heart rate ≥ 70beats/min and ≤ 90beats/min at entering the CT room and just before dosing organic nitrates. Previous allergic reactions to contrast agent Renal failure Asthma
